section.p: Known Subclasses: Result Observation (V3), Functional Status Result Observation, Cognitive Status Result Observation

This clinical statement represents details of a lab, radiology, or other study performed on a patient.
The result observation includes a statusCode to allow recording the status of an observation. If a Results Observation is not completed, the Result Organizer must include corresponding statusCode. "Pending" results (e.g., a test has been run but results have not been reported yet) should be represented as "active" ActStatus.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9138 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7130, R2.1=CONF:1198-7130)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7131, R2.1=CONF:1198-7131)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Result ID) (CONF:7137, R2.1=CONF:1198-7137)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Result Type) (CONF:7133, R2.1=CONF:1198-7133)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7138)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (Result Status) (CONF:7134, R2.1=CONF:1198-7134), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14849, R2.1=CONF:1198-14849)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (Result Date/Time) (CONF:7140)
Represents clinically effective time of the measurement, which may be when the measurement was performed (e.g., a BP measurement), or may be when sample was taken (and measured some time afterwards) CONF:16838
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Result Value) (CONF:7143)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (Result Interpretation) (CONF:7147)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7148, R2.1=CONF:1198-7148)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:7153, R2.1=CONF:1198-7153)

The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7130, R2.1=CONF:1198-7130)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7131, R2.1=CONF:1198-7131)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Result ID) (CONF:7137, R2.1=CONF:1198-7137)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Result Type) (CONF:7133, R2.1=CONF:1198-7133)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7138)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (Result Status) (CONF:7134, R2.1=CONF:1198-7134), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14849, R2.1=CONF:1198-14849)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (Result Date/Time) (CONF:7140)
Represents clinically effective time of the measurement, which may be when the measurement was performed (e.g., a BP measurement), or may be when sample was taken (and measured some time afterwards) CONF:16838
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Result Value) (CONF:7143)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (Result Interpretation) (CONF:7147)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7148, R2.1=CONF:1198-7148)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:7153, R2.1=CONF:1198-7153)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="20774974"/> <code code="922915704"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode code="240751185"/> <methodCode code="529530225"/> <targetSiteCode xsi:type="CE" code="188165917"/> </observation>
